Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
  • public class RegistrationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the Registration Manager login session by utilizing the Singleton model, after validating the user's login credentials and determining there is not a current active instance of Registration Manager
    Author:
    Darren Gonsalves, Alex Bernard, Meles Meles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearData()
      Method for clearing the current course catalog and clearing the current Student Directory should the method be called.

      Gets the requested Course Catalog for the manager to utilize

      Gets the current user that is logging into the WolfScheduler for verification of a valid login session

      Validates that there is no current instance of the Registration Manager

      Gets the requested Student Directory after being called by the UI

      Validates the Registrar's session against the known hashed password in the log

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RegistrationManager getInstance()
        Validates that there is no current instance of the Registration Manager
        Returns:
        a new instance if there is not current Registrar instance

      • getCourseCatalog

        public CourseCatalog getCourseCatalog()
        Gets the requested Course Catalog for the manager to utilize
        Returns:
        the requested Course Catalog from the files

      • getStudentDirectory

        public StudentDirectory getStudentDirectory()
        Gets the requested Student Directory after being called by the UI
        Returns:
        returns the requested directory

      • login

        public boolean login​(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Validates the Registrar's session against the known hashed password in the log
        Parameters:
        id - unique to the user logging in
        password - matching password to the user logging in
        Returns:
        true if the user's ID and hashed password match what is stored in the system otherwise returns false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the hash alogrithm is not working
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if student is null.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Log the current user out of the WolfScheduler

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        Gets the current user that is logging into the WolfScheduler for verification of a valid login session
        Returns:
        current user login session

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Method for clearing the current course catalog and clearing the current Student Directory should the method be called.
